title: 2/1 Rooftop deck w/ocean view 2 blocks to beach
posting_body: Cute Fully Furnished 2/1 1000sq ft free standing beach house blocks from the beach with a rooftop balcony and office nook on the 2nd floor.
Ideal tenant looking for at-least 3 months.
Small 2nd story rooftop deck w/ocean view and dining table for 6.
65 inch Smart TV, and 32 inch smart tv in master bedroom.
Small patio off 2nd bedroom and easy access down to the beach.
Kitchen has granite counter tops and dishwasher/fridge and kenmore gas stove.
Comes with Free WiFi and two bikes to use.
Off street parking, or small spot for compact car.
